items.name: String of Servitude
implicitMods: +75% to Critical Strike Multiplier during any Flask Effect
explicitMods: Implicit Modifier magnitudes are tripled
flavourText: For the Vaal, the relationship between slave and master
was as intimate and volatile as that of lovers.

items.name: Anathema
enchantMods: Your Meteor Towers create Burning Ground for 3 seconds on Hit
explicitMods: +38 to Intelligence
15% increased Cast Speed
16% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Cast a Curse Spell
Your Curse Limit is equal to your maximum Power Charges
flavourText: Enraged by the incompetence of mortals
Unleashing a litany of pain upon the world.

items.name: Havoc March
enchantMods: Damage Penetrates 10% of Enemy Elemental Resistances if you haven't Killed Recently
implicitMods: While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 11% increased Life Regeneration rate
explicitMods: 93% increased Energy Shield
Regenerate 66.3 Life per second
+46% to Fire Resistance
30% increased Movement Speed

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +16% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill. Minions, Totems, Traps and Mines cannot gain Inspiration Charges.

Costs or Effects of Supported Skills
Lose all Inspiration Charges after Spending a total of 800 Mana on Upfront Costs and Effects of Supported Skills
Supported Skills deal 5% more Elemental Damage per Inspiration Charge
Supported Skills have 8% increased Critical Strike Chance per Inspiration Charge

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground in your wake. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1738.6 Base Fire Damage per second
Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Deals 659 to 988 Fire Damage
29% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Dying Sun
explicitMods: 138% increased Charges per use
41% less Duration
14% increased Area of Effect during Effect
Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

Grants 1% increased Elemental Damage per 2% Quality
implicitMods: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: 61% reduced Elemental Resistances

than the scintillating light of utter clarity.
